table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Use of non-foaming and water soluble coolant is strongly recommended. The use of A2-class soluble type, A3-class chemical solution type or synthetic type based coolant can damage the machine (Examples: Peeling of paint, deterioration of rubber parts). Consult with the manufacturer before starting use.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Coolant must be non-corrosive (both to rubber seals and metals).

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Do not use anti-foaming additives unless absolutely necessary to prevent clogging of the drum unit filters. If an anti-foaming additive must be used, the concentration must be properly controlled.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: If use of an oil-based coolant cannot be avoided, a fire extinguishing system must be provided by the customer (Refer to Chapter 1 Safety

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Follow the manufacturers instructions when diluting coolant. DO NOT dilute in the tank.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Follow the manufacturers instructions on coolant concentration to prevent the spreading of mold.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: When storing coolant, avoid direct sunlight and keep it in a cool place. Avoid extremely low temperatures in the winter.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Take measures to prevent mixing with foreign matter, including water.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Disposal procedures vary depending on the type of the cutting fluid. Confirm the proper disposal procedure and dispose of the coolant or request an authorized company to handle this procedure. Do not dispose of untreated coolant into a sewer or a river under any circumstances.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Oil recovered by the oil skimmer cannot be reused. Do not return it to the tank, since this may result in machine trouble.

body.para: Precautions for Starting/Stopping Frequency of Through Spindle Coolant 1.5MPa

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:4px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: The frequency of starting and stopping Through Spindle Coolant is controlled/limited by the motor (3.0kW), however the maximum allowable value is 100 starts/stops per hour. Repeated starting/stopping at a high frequency will significantly shorten the life of the electromagnetic connectors, as well as lead to premature damage to the pump. As much as possible, it is recommended that the number of starts/stops be reduced or continuous operation be performed.

body.para: Through Spindle Coolant Usage Precautions (For Through Spindle Coolant Specs.)

table.style: border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:4px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:10pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: For BT Specs.: Use only retention knobs specified by Makino on tools for which the Through Spindle Coolant function is provided.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: For HSK Specs.: Make sure a lubrication pipe is installed on all tools including tools for which Through Spindle Coolant is not provided (An automatic workpiece measuring unit holder cannot be installed with the lubrication pipe.).

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: Attach lubrication pipe to all tools. In the event Through Spindle Coolant is discharged without attaching a lubrication pipe, coolant will get inside the Spindle, causing premature damage.
